DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate benefit lactation support intervention , conjunction maternal nutritional supplementation .
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim evaluate benefit lactation support intervention model combine maternal nutritional supplementation start 8 week delivery 12 week postpartum lactation support intervention consist 1 prenatal 3 postnatal session exclusive breastfeed rate .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Mother singleton pregnancy 26 29 week gestation . 2 . Mother 20 35 year age . 3 . Mother prepregnant BMI < 25.0 kg/m2 . 4 . Mother firsttime mother . 5 . Mother contactable telephone . 6 . Mother nonsmoker . 7 . Infant singleton full term birth gestational age 3742 week . 8 . Infant 's birth weight > 2500 g. 9 . Infant judge good health . 10 . Mother confirms intention breastfeed refrain take nonstudy maternal milk supplement galactogogues study period . 1 . Mother allergic intolerant ingredient find study product . 2 . An adverse maternal , fetal infant medical history potential effect child 's growth and/or development . 3 . Mother gestational diabetes and/or preeclampsia . 4 . Mother contraindication breastfeed . 5 . Gestational weight gain great 14 kg enrollment . 6 . Mother breast surgery . 7 . Mother and/or newborn infant major illness require intensive care admission . 8 . Infant major congenital anomaly .
